desc: A brand that embraces steadfast functionality and inspires a sustainable lifestyle. Proudly made in America since 2014. When you own any SH9 custom blade or tool, you’re confident in the product and what you’re set out to accomplish.

layout.text: I'M A NAVY VETERAN & OWN 4 SH9 BLADES. THE COMPACT BOWIE IS MY FAVORITE, IT LOOKS LIKE IT’LL KICK YOUR ASS JUST SITTING THERE. ALL IN ALL, IF YOU WANT A HIGH QUALITY BLADE, FOR A MULTITUDE OF USES, CHECK OUT SH9 OUTDOOR SHOP AND TELL HIM BILL SENT YA.
